main event: A witness reported observing a reddish-white object that changed to bluish-white as it traveled across the sky for 1 minute and 30 seconds on August 13, 1966.
interesting points: The object was reported to be the size of a grape and took a vertical climb, disappearing over the horizon., The observation was made from a residential area in Bay Shore, New York., The witness described the object's brightness as being magnitude-2., The possibility of the object being a satellite was considered in the conclusion., The witness filled out a detailed questionnaire about the sighting, including sketches.
sighted object: a reddish-white object that changed to bluish-white
